Documentation Orange County Lettings

Interface de programmation

«  Mise en production   ::   Contenu   ::   Génération de la documentation  »

Interface de programmation¶

Géneral site : oc_lettings_site¶

oc_lettings_site.views.index(request)¶

Display the main page of the site

Paramètres:

  • context (None) – the context is not read in this view

  • template – oc_lettings_site/index.html

Renvoie:

the httpResponse filled with appropriate data

Type renvoyé:

HttpResponse

oc_lettings_site.views.page_not_found(request, exception, template_name='oc_lettings_site/404.html')¶

404 handler.

Paramètres:

  • request_path – The path of the requested URL (e.g., “/app/pages/bad_page/”). It’s quoted to prevent a content injection attack.

  • template – oc_lettings_site/404.html

  • exception – The message from the exception which triggered the 404 (if one was supplied), or the exception class name

Return HttpResponseNotFound:

raise exception error_404 and display the page with the template defined.

oc_lettings_site.views.server_error(request, template_name='oc_lettings_site/500.html')¶

500 error handler.

Paramètres:

  • context (None) – the context is not read

  • template – oc_lettings_site/500.html

Return HttpResponseServerError:

raise exception error_500 and display the page with the template defined.

Application Lettings¶

lettings.views.index(request)¶

Display all the lettins instance in the database

Paramètres:

  • lettings_list (list(lettings.Lettings)) – All instance of lettings.Lettings.

  • template – lettings/index.html

Renvoie:

the httpResponse filled with appropriate data

Type renvoyé:

HttpResponse

Lève:

  • Http404 – Send page 404 if Letting is not found Letting.DoesNotExist

  • Exception – If any other issue append during the retreving of the letting

lettings.views.letting(request, letting_id)¶

Display the letting instance selected by user throught its letting_id

Paramètres:

  • title (string) – The title of lettings.Letting

  • address (lettings.Address) – The address lettings.Address linked to the instance lettings.Letting

  • template – lettings/letting.html

Renvoie:

the httpResponse filled with appropriate data

Type renvoyé:

HttpResponse

Lève:

  • Http404 – Send page 404 if Letting is not found Letting.DoesNotExist

  • Exception – If any other issue append during the retreving of the letting

Application profiles¶

profiles.views.index(request)¶

Display all the profile instances in the database

Paramètres:

  • profiles_list (list(profiles.Profile)) – All instance of profiles.Profile.

  • template – profiles/index.html

Renvoie:

the httpResponse filled with appropriate data

Type renvoyé:

HttpResponse

Lève:

Exception – log event if something unexpected append

profiles.views.profile(request, username)¶

Display the profile instance selected by user throught its username

Paramètres:

  • profile (profile.Profile) – an instance of profiles.Profile

  • template – profiles/profile.html

Renvoie:

the httpResponse filled with appropriate data

Type renvoyé:

HttpResponse

Lève:

  • Http404 – Send page 404 if profile is not found Profile.DoesNotExist

  • Exception – If any other issue append during the retreving of the letting
